alert.note: Alert for Rush (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 4:01AM EDT until March 26 at 4:17AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Indiana, including the following county, Rush. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 400 AM EDT, Gauge reports indicated heavy rain due to recent heavy rain. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Minor flooding is occurring along the Flatrock River. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rushville, Knightstown, Carthage, Milroy, Glenwood, Arlington, Mays, New Salem, Manilla and Moscow. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
